dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT inv.invoice_xid, glog_util.remove_domain(iip.involved_party_contact_gid) customer, invref1.invoice_refnum_value job_type, invref2.invoice_refnum_value job_id, NVL((SELECT DISTINCT j.attribute2 FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),'N/A') booking_number, glog_util.remove_domain(sb.shipment_gid) shipment_xid, inv.invoice_number, TO_CHAR(inv.net_amount_due,'999,999,990.00') amount_due, TO_CHAR(inv.net_due_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') due_date, TO_CHAR(inv.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') create_date, (SELECT DISTINCT orel.payment_method_code_gid FROM order_release orel INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON orel.order_release_gid = jorj.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = sb.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) payment_method FROM invoice inv INNER JOIN shipment_bill sb ON inv.invoice_gid = sb.bill_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_refnum invref1 ON inv.invoice_gid = invref1.invoice_gid AND invref1.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBTYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_refnum invref2 ON inv.invoice_gid = invref2.invoice_gid AND invref2.invoice_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.JOBID' LEFT OUTER JOIN invoice_involved_party iip ON inv.invoice_gid = iip.invoice_gid AND iip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' WHERE inv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND (TO_DATE(inv.insert_date,'DD-MM-RR') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(inv.insert_date,'DD-MM-RR') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
